TextView.android:text: Through the years, Youthopia has been known for its fun and engaging events that have attracted the youth from schools all over the city. However, this year, our fest is much more than that. In these trying times, we stand up for social responsibilities and look at the big picture.We believe in leading by example, which led us to incorporate an awarding structure that no other fest has ever done before.

Usually,fests end up spending a huge amount of money on vouchers for the awardees. However, we plan on donating this amount for a noble cause in the name of the school the awardees belong to. This year, Youthopia is all about motivating the participants to compete and perform for the greater good.

We plan to accumulate all points earned by each school in all the events they have won in and donate the corresponding amount of money.

 The prospective amounts are as follows:

 Rs. 650 for the 1st position
 Rs. 500 for the 2nd position
 Rs. 400 for the 3rd position

 We believe the greatest euphoria comes from fostering someone else’s happiness. Let us swap those hungry bellies for satiated stomachs, those tear-filled eyes for smiles of joy and those heart-wrenching out cries of help for soul-soothing celebrations of equality. Let us reach the epitome of euphoria.We proudly present to you, Youthopia ’21 – Epitome of Euphoria, a fest with a difference.
